notes.text: We've resolved an issue where the DataFieldForAction label was not translated in an error message
We’ve added additional export settings for columns
We now provide an experimental API to support the collaborative draft in reuse components
You can now disable navigation on specific rows of a table
You can now preserve the exact decimal places returned from the back end for currency values
You can now use Empty and NotEmpty filter operators for date fields
We’ve added milliseconds as a filter option to the DateTimeOffset property
